tool.name: Disjoint
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayInputEntity1 False isArrayInputEntity2 False output_data_Result $output_data_Result name Disjoint InputEntity1 $InputEntity1 InputEntity2 $InputEntity2 prefer $prefer response $response transmissionMode_Result $OutputSection_Result.transmissionMode_Result

param.name: InputEntity1
param.label: the first geometry
param.help: the first geometry. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml

param.name: InputEntity2
param.label: the other geometry
param.help: the other geometry. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_Result
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

tool.help: This servuce shall return a true value if and only if the geometries g1 and g2 have no point in common.
